title: $:/litClock/times/-19:42-Sophie Kinsella
quote_first: I glance at my watch as we speed along the Strand.
quote_last: . I’m starting to feel quite excited. The street outside is still bright and warm and tourists are walking along in T-shirts and shorts, pointing at the High Court. It must have been a gorgeous summer’s day. Inside the air-conditioned Carter Spink building you have no idea what the weather in the real world is doing.
